mapper.select:
select ID, DIC_ID, DATA_TYPE_CODE, DATA_NAME, DATA_VALUE, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USERID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USERID from CW_GE_DIC_DATA
DATA_TYPE_CODE like concat('%', #{dataTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and DATA_NAME like concat('%', #{dataName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by CREATED_TIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into CW_GE_DIC_DATA(ID, DIC_ID, DATA_TYPE_CODE, DATA_NAME, DATA_VALUE, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USERID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USERID) values(#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdUserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedUserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update CW_GE_DIC_DATA set UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime, jdbcType=BIGINT},
DATA_TYPE_CODE = #{dataTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_NAME = #{dataName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_VALUE = #{dataValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USERID = #{updatedUserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
